title: Take a Breath
description: I’m obsessed with a man I can’t have.For over a year, I have not only worked with Jake, but I have lived with him too.Why can’t I have him?He’s getting married to my mother.When she suddenly decides to move out of the house, the tension between Jake and I reaches a fever pitch. Feelings which had been bottled up for so long are now bursting to get out. I can no longer hide the overwhelming emotions that flow through me.Unfortunately, neither can a serial killer on the loose dubbed “The Blonde Killer.” I am his obsession.And Jake, the senior detective in charge of the Major Investigations Unit, is responsible for catching the murderer.I’m scared, but I know Jake will do everything in his power to protect me.I feel things can’t get any worse.Until they do.
author: Jaimie Roberts
